headline: How Dow’s (DOW) EV and Recycling Innovations Could Offset Legal Risks for Investors
summary: Dow recently unveiled a new high-reliability silicone gel for advanced electric vehicle and renewable energy applications and, in partnership with Gruppo Fiori, announced technical breakthroughs in polyurethane recycling for end-of-life vehicles, while also facing an ongoing class action lawsuit related to alleged disclosure issues. These product and recycling advances highlight Dow’s focus on next-generation mobility and sustainability solutions, though they come amid legal and business...
